body:
Comment 564 by **andrew.gamache**: 
Unfortunately, when you snooze you loose mccabe. You didn't trademark the name, and you
didn't make a big 
enough impact for anyone to care. If you want meritocratic respect I suggest you stay in
the academic sector 
where projects like yours belong. Being a part of industry means following the rules of
competition, and you 
failed at that.
